::Surgital::

      Surgital avoided the first bolt but the second hit him =
in the chest.  He gasped in pain as the electric shock surged through his b=
ody.  Surgital attempted to fire a large energon net from his knee at Lavat=
ron, to at least have him caught up for a moment.
  ----- Original Message =
----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thur=
sday, April 26, 2001 11:25 AM
  Subject: Re: Gestalts


  ::Lavatron::

  L=
avatron jumped back to avoid the blade, and launched two more bolts 
  at S=
urgital's chest. The ground shook as he stepped back a few times 
  to keep=
 his balance after avioding the blade.



  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbys=
s" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
  > ::Abominus/Surgital::
  > 
  >     Abominus=
 moved a little, but was still hit in the head and 
  chest by the missiles=
.  He stumbled back quite far actually, 5 steps 
  is kinda far for a gesta=
lt to stumble back from a normal heighted 
  warrior's perspective.  Abomin=
us snarled meanly at Galaxor, then 
  fired 2 beams from the lazer from his=
 lower chest.
  > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  >        Su=
rgital heard the lightning bolt, and quickly turned around 
  and side-step=
ped just in time to avoid the lightning bolt by a speck 
  or two.  Then, S=
urgital converted his hand into a saw blade again, 
  and this time shot th=
e saw blade at Lavatron's head.  (BTW, the blade 
  was shot vertical, so m=
oving to the side gives a better chance of 
  dodging it.)
